meanings.definition: The quality or state of being round.
meanings.sent1: The roundness of the ball made it easy to catch.
meanings.sent2: The roundness of the moon was visible in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The roundness of the cake made it look like a giant donut.
meanings.sent4: Her face had the roundness of a full moon, glowing with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The roundness of the tire made it perfect for rolling down the hill.

meanings.definition: The shape or form of something that is circular or spherical.
meanings.sent1: The roundness of the plate matched the curve of the table.
meanings.sent2: The roundness of the basketball made it bounce in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent3: The roundness of the watermelon made it hard to slice evenly.
meanings.sent4: The roundness of the earth is what gives us day and night.
meanings.sent5: The roundness of the marble made it roll smoothly across the floor.
